definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: The second is that he dare to object to former doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 二是他敢於疑經惑古，駁正舊注多精當。

sentences.english: The new book presents the subject of grammar in a small compass.
sentences.chinese: 這本新書對語法的解釋簡潔精當。

sentences.english: "The Analects" words precise and appropriate, can serve as a literary books to read.
sentences.chinese: 《論語》字句精當，也可當做文學書籍來讀。
